data.title: Iggy Azalea, Wiz Khalifa Team Up for New Furious 7 Song "Go Hard"
data.meta_description: Iggy Azalea and Wiz Khalifa recently teamed up to record a new song called "Go Hard or Go Home" for the Furious 7 soundtrack -- take a listen!
data.text:
Dynamic duo! Iggy Azalea and Wiz Khalifa combined forces for an electric new single off of the Furious 7 movie soundtrack.

The two rappers recorded "Go Hard or Go Home," one of the 16 offerings on the album, which accompanies the upcoming action sequel.

"Black and Yellow" performer Khalifa, 27, opens the track, rapping, "I feel like the sky is falling down / Ain't nobody here to play around / Push it to the edge, I won't back down / Cause it's time to go hard or go home." Amber Rose's ex-husband is soon joined in the track by Azalea.

The "Fancy" rapper, 25, spits, "People always askin' me how I got this far / My response is just to keep it honest and be who you are / Now they call me Mrs. Money like I'm married to the moola / Just to measure my success I need at least a hundred rulers / Glory, hallelujah, I'ma take that ass to church / I'ma finish like I started, Iggy still got that work."

Khalifa, who previously recorded a song "We Own It" for the Fast & Furious 6 soundtrack, shared his collaboration with Azalea on Twitter on Monday, Feb. 16.

"@IGGYAZALEA i like your verse on go hard or go home," he wrote. "Can't wait to do the video :)"

Hitting theaters in April, Furious 7 also got some star power on its soundtrack from the likes of T.I., Tyga, Future, and Flo Rida, among others. Take a listen to "Go Hard or Go Home" above, and check out the full tracklisting below!

Furious 7 Soundtrack:

1. "Ride Out" – Kid Ink, Tyga, Wale, YG, Rich Homie Quan

2. "Off-set" – T.I. & Young Thug

3. "How Bad Do You Want It (Oh Yeah)" – Sevyn Streeter

4. "Get Low" – Dillon Francis & DJ Snake

5. "Go Hard or Go Home" – Wiz Khalifa & Iggy Azalea

6. "My Angel" – Prince Royce

7. "See You Again" – Wiz Khalifa (feat. Charlie Puth)

8. "Payback" – Juicy J, Kevin Gates, Future, Sage The Gemini

9. "Blast Off" – David Guetta & Kaz James

10. "Six Days" (Remix) – DJ Shadow (feat. Mos Def)

11. "Ay Vamos" – J. Balvin (feat. French Montana and Nicky Jam)

12. "GDFR" (Noodles Remix) – Flo Rida (feat. Sage The Gemini and Lookas)

13. "Turn Down For What" – DJ Snake & Lil Jon

14. "Meneo" – Fito Blanko

15. "I Will Return" – Skylar Grey

16. "Whip" - Famous To Most (Bonus Track)
